mapper.select: select rownum, a.*, b.rec_wantedno, b.co_name, b.rec_indtpcdnm, b.rec_wantedtitle, b.rec_receiptclosedt, b.rec_regdt, b.rec_region from advice a, recruit b where a.rec_wantedno = b.rec_wantedno and a.rec_wantedno is not null and ind_id=#{id}

select rownum, a.*, b.open_seqno, b.open_title, b.open_conm, b.open_region, b.open_sdate, b.open_edate from advice a, open_rec b where a.open_seqno = b.open_seqno and a.open_seqno is not null and ind_id=#{id}
mapper.update: insert into advice (adv_no, ind_id, rec_wantedno, open_seqno) values (advice_seq.nextval, #{indId}, #{recWantedno}, #{openSeqno})
